text:
Food is great and delicious made by seasoned chef. repeat customer & will come back again.

Owner is a retired head chef since Long beach restaurant in 1990s whose food delighted common people, dignitaries, and ministers alike. I have eaten multiple dishes cooked in innovative ways that they imagined to life (from Porridges -> curry noodle -> fish soup -> chicken rice -> Hokkien Mee) all within a span of a year. Everything tastes great and served with good utensils unlike other standard PVC plates and bowls.

This store is a great hidden gem in heart of Potong Pasir & fortunately not many are aware of it (hence not much queues ðŸ˜‰). Will keep visiting back this shop again.

Tried both their curry dishes ( rice and noodles)...both were excellent and quite pleasant at a very good price.

Curry was not too salty and chicken was nicely steamed and tender. Presentation surprised me a lot with how beautiful the fried egg is.

For the price U pay, the meal was very worth it!
delicious, hearty and affordable food! Came back with my family twice within 2 weeks! And will definitely be coming back pretty often to try the other dishes :)) owner is very friendly too!

Yummy soy sauce chicken set meal. Good presentation. On another day, I bought the fish porridge. As Iâ€™m used to Cantonese-style porridge, the taste profile was slightly different. They used fresh fish slices so there were a few tiny bones to be careful of; just bear in mind if buying for children or old folks who might need feeding care.

The chicken and fish soups tasted really good, with a good balance of flavour that wasnâ€™t overpowering. Chicken and fish pieces were cooked to a great texture and firmness.

Plating was quite spot on too. Would want to come back to try their banh mi.

Customer service was great too.
